subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
description: They found a cave: Four English orphans migrate to Tasmania under the care of their Aunt. Their Aunt becomes sick and is hospitalised, leaving the children to seek refuge in a secret cave. Excitement follows the children as they face danger and adventure in the rugged terrain before they are finally reunited with their Aunt. Based on the novel by Nan Chauncy. "Waxworks": A short tale about children lost in a waxwork museum "House of Horrors".
